index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF CONSTRUCTION AND LAND USE
summary: AN ORDINANCE transferring authority to enforce the provision of the Mechanical Refrigeration Ordinance including the authority to accept applications, charge fees and issue permits, amending Chapter 6.82 "Refrigeration Systems" of the Seattle Municipal Code (last amended by Ordinance 112541), relating to the refrigeration code and providing for licensing requirements; also amending Section 201(a) of the Seattle Mechanical Code (adopted by Ordinance 111201), relating to responsibility for enforcement, creating a new position and increasing appropriation authority in the 1986 Budget of the Department of Construction and Land Use.
